    • getFirstAvailablePlaceholder

      private Map<String,Integer> getFirstAvailablePlaceholder(String[][] board, String identifier, Object color, boolean isAllColorsArea)
      Return the position of the first available placeholder of a given type in a given board
      Parameters:
      board - matrix of interests (could be the entire game-board)
      identifier - ID of the pawn
      color - color of the pawn
      isAllColorsArea - refers to a zone where the pawn has not a defined color
      Returns:
      map containing a starting row and a starting column

      identifier - ID of the pawn

      Add a given string into a matrix replacing existing content
      Parameters:

      text - text to be inserted
      offset_x - x coordinate of the first letter of the text in matrix
      offset_y - y coordinate of the first letter of the text in matrix
      Returns:
      updated matrix

      Parameters:
      set - matrix containing all the islands
      disposition - disposition matrix
      islandH - height of the island
      islandW - width of the island
      spaceH - vertical space between the islands
      spaceW - horizontal space between the islands
      Returns:
      updated matrix
